reviews.title: Excellent idea, getting better
reviews.comment: I use both a Motorola bionic and Asus transformer. Latest update had gotten better, I\'m able to use the 3x zoom on the phone and tablet. Its usable now so Ill start working with it and see how much it helps. Keep up the hard work.
reviews.author: Nicholas Keim

reviews.title: Average - had great potential
reviews.comment: Where is Stryker\'s island? Zoom functionality has improved through versions but still doesn\'t makes sense. Adding and viewing points is very hard on a phone, and I have a big screen. I would pay for this if adding points was easy and zooming was fluid
reviews.author: Andrew Berzley

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.comment: Pretty good, however the spelling is a bit off. I assume you\'re trying to spell \"Corner\" but put some weird word. And a few other words. As other reviews stated the zoom is quite hard. Otherwise, good job.
reviews.author: Sebastian Durland

reviews.title: Maps?
reviews.comment: I can\'t see the maps uninstalling till later date. :(
reviews.author: Nathan Harvey

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Crashes whenever I try to open Gotham or Metropolis map. Please fix.
reviews.author: Suzaku Waran

reviews.title: Hmmmm
reviews.comment: Omfg what a terrible app the zoom is virtually unusable so is the map scrolling. Also when the map is zoomed it loses all the detail which makes just a blank background with a lot of coloured dots on. Simply put LOOOOOOOOOOOOOL
reviews.author: Robert Hay

reviews.title: Great potential but...
reviews.comment: An issue happens when trying to zoom into the map.
reviews.author: Ross McIntyre

reviews.title: Can\'t zoom in 4x
reviews.comment: Says I don\'t have the memory, yet I have 13 gigs free space....uninstall.
reviews.author: marc kimmel

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Pop ups are in the way of selecting anything...uninstall...
reviews.author: alex ray

reviews.title: Settings
reviews.comment: The settings don\'t work and when I go to remove a mark I made it won\'t let me.
reviews.author: Joe Berlin

reviews.title: No go
reviews.comment: Every time I try to see the metro map it crashes
reviews.author: Gabriel Colon
